posts.title: My Quest For the Ultimate Nuxt.js Wesbite Template
posts.description: Nuxtify, a Nuxt.js Website Boilerplate with Vuetify is introduced. It aims to be reusable, reliable, and scalable

posts.title: Using Firebase Auth With Nuxt.js
posts.subtitle: Part 1
posts.description: This article is an overview of using Nuxt.js with Firebase Authentication. Learn how to check for admin access in your routes and use Vuex with Nuxt.js and Firebase to keep everything manageable.

posts.title: Tips After Building a Site with Nuxt.js
posts.description: A few simple tips for anyone using Nuxt.js. This includes covering how to handle mobile menu state once a link is choosen from the menu and making sure to close the menu when appropriate.
